pages.text: While active, the $(item)Sigil of Suppressed Appetite$() will suppress natural health regeneration from food.$(br2)While seemingly useless to most, it is a godsend to any blood mage that practices the art of self-sacrifice.$(br2)Constantly having to eat after draining a small amount of blood can result in many mages

eating their entire food stockpiles in a matter of hours, if not minutes.$(br2)The use of this sigil allows blood mages to rely on, and benefit more from, other means of recovery such as potions, bandages, or spells.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)0 LP$()
